FAQ

How does CommentGPT work?
CommentGPT uses advanced AI to generate context-aware comments for social media posts by analyzing the text, images, and existing comments. After selecting the comment type and language, the tool creates a relevant comment for the post. Users can also add custom text to further personalize the prompt, ensuring tailored, engaging responses.

How do I use CommentGPT?
Using CommentGPT is simple. After installation, visit a social media post on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, or LinkedIn. Click the CommentGPT button above the comment input field. Select the comment type and language, and click "Generate Comment." Optionally, add custom text to be included in the AI prompt for a personalized response. CommentGPT will then craft a context-aware comment based on the post's text, images, and existing comments.

Can CommentGPT handle multiple languages?
Yes, CommentGPT supports a wide range of languages, including right-to-left (RTL) languages like Hebrew and Arabic, allowing users to generate comments in their preferred language. CommentGPT can automatically detect the language of the post or content, ensuring that the comment aligns with the post’s context. Additionally, users can manually select their desired language, providing full control over how comments are crafted.
